PageSocialNetworks.title: Connect with me
PageSocialNetworks.description: Find GatoArtStudio on all platforms and social media. Follow me to stay up to date with my projects and content!

discord.description: Join my server to chat and collaborate

tiktok.description: Short videos about development and technology

patreon.description: Support my work and access exclusive content

MainHero.title: Hello, I am
MainHero.subtitle: Full Stack Software Developer
MainHero.description: Specializing in web development, desktop applications, and Minecraft development. Creating digital solutions with passion and creativity.

description.part1: I'm <name>Hervis Cortes</name>, a software developer passionate about creating innovative digital solutions. Known online as <alias>GatoArtStudio</alias>, I specialize in web development, desktop applications, and Minecraft development.
description.part2: My journey in programming began with a curiosity to understand how the digital things we use every day work. That curiosity turned into a passion, and that passion into a career dedicated to building exceptional digital experiences.
description.part3: When I'm not coding, I enjoy exploring new technologies, contributing to open source projects, and sharing knowledge with the developer community.

MainSkills.title: My Skills
MainSkills.description: A diverse set of technical and professional skills that allow me to tackle complex projects and deliver high-quality solutions.

features.feature3: Development of plugins and mods for Minecraft
features.feature4: Programming bots for Discord and Twitch

features.feature1: Management and configuration of VPS and Minecraft servers
features.feature3: Automation of tasks and continuous deployment (CI/CD) with DevOps practices

MainTechnologies.title: Technologies and Tools
MainTechnologies.description: The technologies and tools I use to create efficient and modern digital solutions.

MainProjects.title: My Projects
MainProjects.description: A selection of projects that demonstrate my skills and experience in different areas of development.

minemuHostingWeb.title: Minemu Hosting
minemuHostingWeb.description: Minemu Hosting's main website, where they offer hosting services for Minecraft and have a network for their community.

kailandWeb.title: Kailand
kailandWeb.description: This website has several sections that allow Kailand users to access social networks, download the launcher, and explore a wiki with information about items and other custom server resources.

appGatoBot.title: GatoBot
appGatoBot.description: Discord bot in Python with an automated deployment system. When the project starts, a Discord bot, a REST API server, a static web service, and a Cloudflare tunnel are deployed to provide web and API access.

botView.title: BotView
botView.description: This tool allows you to generate views on your videos, YouTube, TikTok.

kailandLauncher.title: Kailand Launcher
kailandLauncher.description: A launcher for Minecraft Java developed in Python with Flet. It's fully automated, so the user doesn't need to install anything. The launcher pre-configures and installs everything and includes a settings section and a client-side mods section for customizing the game.

authGatun.title: AuthGatun 2FA
authGatun.description: 2FA application for Windows, Linux, and macOS, using C# and Avalonia UI.

muneCratPlugin.title: MuneCraft Plugin
muneCratPlugin.description: MuneCrat-Plugin is a comprehensive Minecraft server plugin designed for the Mu√±eCraft community server. It integrates Minecraft with Discord authentication, provides custom gameplay features, and offers administrative tools for server management. The plugin requires players to link their Discord accounts before accessing server features and implements a sophisticated permissions system to control access to those features.

kailandPluginMinecraft.title: Kailand Plugin
kailandPluginMinecraft.description: This plugin allows the server to only authorize one Minecraft account to enter the Kailand server. How does it know which is the correct account? Well, it has an API that receives the data of each user from the Kailand launcher.

MainFooter.description: Software developer specializing in web, desktop, and Minecraft solutions
